name: Eude the Dreamer: The Dreamer
description:
Shoot to kill! Destroy the Nightmares! Eviscerate the Robots! (Shoot the eyes).

Best played with controller

This game is difficult.... Good luck!



Leader: Ashton Ward, Jack Weald

Programming: Josh Ashley, Morgan Umbers, Samuel Morton

Art/Modelling: Ben Ricci, Conrad Schroder, Myles

Music: Thom Weeks

Credit to https://github.com/wwwtyro/space-3d/blob/gh-pages/LICENSE for the skybox creation
